name: Rhythm & Beats
description:
MAIN FEATURES

  • Play to any audio from your PC including streamed audio
  • Add your own .wav/.mp3 audio to play to
  • Record your own music with ability to add your own sound effects for the drum sounds
  • 5 levels of difficulty,

Can you keep up with the Rhythm

Play to the rhythm of your favorites songs! You can play to any Live audio sound playing on your PC or jam to downloaded songs. For the creative type you can add any sound effects to the drums and record your own songs.
